featured.text: In a radio interview, Dom expressed his disappointment and explained how the accident took place.
The famous film director Ang Lee recalls his father’s disappointment with him when he was young.

definition.zh_def: 失望；對某事或某人未能達到期望的感受。
definition.en_def: A feeling of sadness or displeasure caused by the non-fulfillment of one's hopes or expectations.
definition.example: She felt a deep sense of disappointment when she didn't get the job.
